attributes.action: create a more civilised parliament without all the shouting and jeering
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I regularly watch PM's questions and am always dismayed at how uncivilised the exchanges of ideas can be. The jeering and shouting looks like something out of the 19th century. We are supposed to be a democracy in this country, represented by responsible elected people, not a bunch of rowdy schoolchildren. 

Let's make a modern parliament with proper debate and less of the childish antics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
